P009685.project_name: Fertilizer Expansion and Plant Operation Project

keywords.cdata: accounting,balance sheet,Balance Sheets,capital employed,capitalization,cash flow statements,coal,crops,current assets,Dam,Debt,deposits,dividends,Ecology,economic life,Economic Rate of Return,Employment,equipment,expenditures,farm,Farmers,feed,Fertilizer,Fertilizers,financial performance,financial structure,FISCAL YEAR,fixed costs,food production,forecasts,Foreign Exchange,Gross Profit,growth rate,imports,Income Statements,interest rate,labor force,liquidity,Marketing,maturities,Metals,methanol,net loss,Net Sales,net worth,oil,Operating Income,pollution,pollution control,price increases,private sector,produce,Production Costs,Profitability,Savings,seed,technical assistance,working capital

project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would include construction of additional facilities at FCI's plant located at Trombay, Maharashtra, to increase the production capacity of nitric acid by 250,000 TPY and nitrophosphate fertilizers by 355,000 TPY, and improvement of capacity utilization at existing FCI and FACT fertilizer plants, including plants about to be commissioned.
